Description_lang: Finishing move that infects the target with shadowy energy, dealing Shadow damage over time and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by $s7%. Lasts longer per combo point.   1 point  : ${$<damage>*8/6} over 8 sec   2 points: ${$<damage>*10/6} over 10 sec   3 points: ${$<damage>*12/6} over 12 sec   4 points: ${$<damage>*14/6} over 14 sec   5 points: ${$<damage>*16/6} over 16 sec$?s193531[   6 points: ${$<damage>*18/6} over 18 sec][]You deal $s6% increased damage to enemies afflicted by your Nightblade.
AuraDescription_lang: Suffering $w1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec.Healing effects reduced by $s7%.Taking $s6% increased damage from the Rogue.
